thread.title: Twinkle Khanna And Akshay Kumar Enjoy Their Sunday With These Celebrity Couples!
thread.title_full: Twinkle Khanna And Akshay Kumar Enjoy Their Sunday With These Celebrity Couples!

title: Twinkle Khanna And Akshay Kumar Enjoy Their Sunday With These Celebrity Couples!
text:
facebook 
We feel super happy when we see celebrity couples mingling together. We all know about the Khan-Kapoor-Arora squad, but looks like there is another clique that might just take over this one. Recently, Twinkle Khanna shared a picture where Hrithik Roshan, Suzanne Khan, Gayatri and Vikas Oberoi, and husband Akshay Kumar, are all seen chilling together. 
Post their divorce, Hrithik and Suzanne have often been spotted together. We hope they give their relationship another chance. Also, who knew that these three celebrity couples are good friends and enjoy chilling on Sundays together? A photo posted by Twinkle Khanna (@twinklerkhanna) on Feb 5, 2017 at 5:29am PST Photo Credit: Instagram
